Shangwen's Blog

This is where I keep some of my learning notes, my thoughts, and more.

Who am I?

I received my PhD in pharmacognosy, studying biologically active natural products from cyanobacteria, using methods such as MS spectrometry and NMR spectroscopy. I am on my way towards a master's degree in computer science. I believe that by combining perspectives and methodologies obtained from computer science into pharmacognosy research, novel discoveries are going to blossom!
